${modID}:RondelmancyPower.NAME: Rondelmancy
DESCRIPTIONS: When you gain #yShivs, gain #b%d more #yShiv%s. If your hand is full, play them instead.

${modID}:UpdateJammerPower.NAME: Update Jammer
DESCRIPTIONS: Orbs continue their passive effects after being #yEvoked.
Update Jammer may have unpredictable results with modded orbs!

${modID}:OrbShockPower.NAME: Jammed Lightning
DESCRIPTIONS: Activate #b%d passive #yLightning%s at the end of your turn.

${modID}:OrbFrostPower.NAME: Jammed Frost
DESCRIPTIONS: Activate #b%d passive #yFrost%s at the end of your turn.

${modID}:OrbDarkPower.NAME: Jammed Darkness
DESCRIPTIONS: Activate #b%d passive #yDark%s at the end of your turn.

${modID}:OrbPlasmaPower.NAME: Jammed Plasma
DESCRIPTIONS: Activate #b%d passive #yPlasma%s at the start of your turn.

${modID}:OrbStarlightPower.NAME: Jammed Starlight
DESCRIPTIONS: Activate #b%d passive #yStarlight%s at the start of your turn.

${modID}:OrbHorizonPower.NAME: Jammed Horizon
DESCRIPTIONS: Activate #b%d passive #yHorizon%s at the start of your turn.

${modID}:OrbMysteryPower.NAME: Jammed
DESCRIPTIONS: Activate #b%d passive #y%s%s at the start or end of your turn.
Mystery

${modID}:CruelSunPower.NAME: Solar Intensity
DESCRIPTIONS: You cannot exit #yWrath.

${modID}:DoubleCardsPower.NAME: Cruelty
DESCRIPTIONS: All your cards are played twice.

${modID}:FracturePower.NAME: Fracture
DESCRIPTIONS: Receive #b%d additional damage from #yAttacks. Reduce #yFracture by #b1 each turn.

${modID}:LoseFocusPower.NAME: Focus Down
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, lose #b%d #yFocus.

${modID}:HyperPropellantPower.NAME: No Channeling
DESCRIPTIONS: Cannot #yChannel Orbs for #b%d turn%s.

${modID}:MordhauPower.NAME: Mordhau
DESCRIPTIONS: Your #yAttacks apply #yFracture to all enemies for #b%d turn%s.

${modID}:PublicVoidPower.NAME: Public Void
DESCRIPTIONS: Cost 0 cards trigger the passive ability of all #yDark Orbs #b%d time%s.

${modID}:BatteringRamPower.NAME: Battering
DESCRIPTIONS: Deal #b%d damage to enemies when you attack them.

${modID}:StargazerPower.NAME: Stargazer
DESCRIPTIONS: #yChannel #b%d #yStarlight%s at the end of your turn.

${modID}:AcrimonyPower.NAME: Acrimony
DESCRIPTIONS: Receive #b10%% additional damage for every card in your hand. Reduce #yAcrimony by #b1 each turn.

${modID}:CausticsPower.NAME: Caustics
DESCRIPTIONS: Your #yShivs apply #b1 #yAcrimony for #b%d turn%s.

${modID}:SadomasochismPower.NAME: Sadomasochism
DESCRIPTIONS: Draw #b%d card%s whenever you apply #yPoison.

${modID}:TachycardiaPower.NAME: Tachycardia
DESCRIPTIONS: Apply #b%d #yAcrimony to enemies whenever you discard. At the end of your turns, enemies gain #yPoison equal to their #yAcrimony.

${modID}:AmbientDeathPower.NAME: Ambient Death
DESCRIPTIONS: Playing #ySkills applies #b%d #yPoison to all enemies.

${modID}:FoolhardyPower.NAME: Foolhardy
DESCRIPTIONS: Every #b10 #yBlock gained, reduce the cost of a random card in your hand by #b%d.

${modID}:ReturnHPPower.NAME: Return HP
DESCRIPTIONS: When attacked, you heal #b%d HP.

${modID}:BurningMontantePower.NAME: Burning Montante
DESCRIPTIONS: Your #yAttacks that cost 2 or more cost 1 more, and are played #b%d additional time%s.

${modID}:ShockAndAwePower.NAME: Shock and Awe
DESCRIPTIONS: #yChannel #b%d random #yOrb%s whenever you #yChannel #yLightning.

${modID}:JetFuelPower.NAME: Jet Fuel Mixture
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a #yPower, gain #b%d additional stack%s of all other buffs and debuffs.

${modID}:WaterCoolingPower.NAME: Water Cooled
DESCRIPTIONS: The next #b%d cost 0 card%s you play will be played an additional time.

${modID}:WaterfallPower.NAME: Waterfall
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you enter #yCalm [REMOVE_SPACE], #yScry #b%d [REMOVE_SPACE].

${modID}:TraumaturgyPower.NAME: Traumaturgy
DESCRIPTIONS: If you are not in a #yStance [REMOVE_SPACE], enter #yTension [REMOVE_SPACE].

${modID}:TryCatchPower.NAME: Try Catch
DESCRIPTIONS: The next Orb you #yChannel will be added to #yTry #yCatch [REMOVE_SPACE].

${modID}:BloodHuntPower.NAME: Blood Hunt
DESCRIPTIONS: Receive doubled damage from #yAttacks. Reduces by #b1 each turn.

${modID}:UndistortPower.NAME: Undistorted
DESCRIPTIONS: Your hand size is 99 for #b%d turn%s.

${modID}:HeartbeatPower.NAME: Heartbeat
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time you play an #yAttack each turn, enter #yCalm [REMOVE_SPACE].

${modID}:PotentialPower.NAME: Unlocked Potential
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b%d #yRelic%s after combat.

${modID}:BlacklightPoison.NAME: Poison
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of its turn and whenever #yPoison is applied, loses #b
HP, then reduce #yPoison by #b2 [REMOVE_SPACE].

${modID}:EdgeAlignmentPower.NAME: Edge Alignment
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you discard a #yShiv [REMOVE_SPACE], #yExhaust it and #yShivs deal #b%d additional damage.

${modID}:ElectricBaghnakhsPower.NAME: Electric Baghnakhs
DESCRIPTIONS: Increases attack damage of cost 0 cards by #b%d [REMOVE_SPACE].

${modID}:IridiumToxinsPower.NAME: Iridium Toxins
DESCRIPTIONS:
Whenever you apply #yPoison [REMOVE_SPACE], increase applied #yPoison by #b%d for the rest of combat.
 (Currently applies #b%d additional #yPoison [REMOVE_SPACE])

${modID}:SentiencePower.NAME: Sentience
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you #yChannel an orb, #yChannel it again.

${modID}:IncensedPower.NAME: Incensed Fury
DESCRIPTIONS: Cannot exit #yWrath [REMOVE_SPACE].
